Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Drexel
ShortDescription: #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Woodlawn and 63rd due to police activity on 63rd/Drexel.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 63rd due to police activity on 63rd/Drexel.

Allow extra travel time.
